author: Maachi, F
adress: Inst Pasteur Maroc, Helicobacter Pylori & Gastr Pathol Lab, Casablanca 20360, Morocco
title: Association of Tumor Necrosis Factor Receptor 1 Promoter Gene Polymorphisms (-580 A/G and-609 G/T) and TNFR1 Serum Levels with the Susceptibility to Gastric Precancerous Lesions and Gastric Cancer Related to H. pylori Infection in a Moroccan Population
